elements.name: ama
elements.title: What questions(s) are top of mind for you?
choices: What are the differences between the different kits managed by the Power CAT team?
Do you have examples of end to ALM working with the Automation Kit?
Do you have examples of KPIs for my industry?
What are frequently asked questions about the Automation Kit?
Are you looking to simplify the install experience?
Can you tell me more about localization of Applications and Dashboards?
Where can I see a list of current issues for the Automation Kit?
Can you provide further case studies of how the Automation Kit has been used by and been used to  assist other organizations?

elements.name: ranked-questions
elements.title: Please rank the areas of interest to you
